description: Tool to apply a transformation defined in a transform file to an input vector file.

transform_file.title: Transform file
transform_file.description: Transform file, can be an eddy_correct/eddy log file or a .mat file.

input_vector_file.title: Input vector file
input_vector_file.description: Input vector file which can be formatted in 3 rows or 3 columns.

output_vector_file.title: Output vector file
output_vector_file.description: Output vector file will have the same format as input.
